content: The Piranha is a multi-function attachment that one user called “An unbelievable tool that turns your ... into a 'Big Boy' excavator. The Piranha Tooth Bar slices and gouges its way through the toughest terrain converting the front loader into a weapon of mass destruction. Installs in less time than it takes to BBQ a steak -- you won't believe how easily your Piranha can chew your backyard mountain into a molehill!!"
